Package com.example.StudentManagement.controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.StudentManagement.controller.StudentController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/student") public class StudentController extends Object
The StudentController class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to student operations. It uses the StudentService to perform operations such as login, activation, password recovery, and fetching student and tutor information.
Author:
Shuyi Yang, Yangcheng Liu

    • studentLogin

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> studentLogin(@RequestBody Student student)
      Handles student login requests.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object containing login credentials.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the login result.

    • active

      @PostMapping("/active") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> active(@RequestBody Student student)
      Activates a student account.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object containing activation details.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the activation result.

    • forgetPasswd

      @PostMapping("/forget") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> forgetPasswd(@RequestBody Student student)
      Handles password recovery for a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object containing details for password recovery.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the password recovery result.

    • getStudentInfo

      @GetMapping("/getStuInfo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Student> getStudentInfo(@RequestParam("studentID") String studentID)
      Retrieves information for a specific student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the Student object if found, or a NOT_FOUND status.

    • getTutorInfo

      @GetMapping("/getTutorInfo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Staff> getTutorInfo(@RequestParam("studentID") String studentID)
      Retrieves information for the tutor of a specific student by the student's ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the Staff (tutor) object if found, or a NOT_FOUND status.
